name: echo-monorepo
description: Echo Music Server - Self-hosted music streaming

scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm docker:dev && pnpm --filter echo-server-backend setup:env && pnpm db:reset
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,magenta "pnpm --filter echo-server-backend dev" "pnpm --filter echo-frontend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter echo-frontend build && pnpm --filter echo-server-backend build
